content: I absolutely love this app! It's so practical to be able to surf preferred titles as well as customized top choices. I have actually located that it's also very easy to contrast watch alternatives to locate the most effective location to see any title. The individual as well as critic testimonials are a wonderful enhancement, and also I always discover something brand-new to view when I read them.

The application enables customers to search popular faves and also individualized leading choices, contrast watch options to locate the most effective location to view any type of title, as well as check out individual and also doubter reviews.

This is been my go-to movie information source for years. As a former web designer the one small thing that catches my attention is the navigation throughout the site. It's only small changes that need to be made but when you're searching through films etc and going through other parts of the site it requires you to start at the very top and you find yourself scrolling and scrolling and scrolling. Outside of that the app is pretty awesome.
IMDb is an amazing app that keeps track of movies and TV shows. It has a ton of information and is easily accessible. It's a must-have for movie and TV buffs!
